tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
About Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu

I came to know about Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu after doing an online search regarding the best Laproscopic surgeons in Hyderabad. After reading several experiences that her pateints have shared on various online forums, I was more optimistic about my problem being resolved in the best possible way. When I first met her on 23rd Jan 2021 in her clinic, I was little nervous about how to get started with sharing my previous health issues. The way Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu received me and made me comfortable and gave me time to settle down, I felt it to be very good. She was very kind and patient to listen to my entire story and gave me the confidence that everything's gonna be alright. She has a very striking personality and has a positive energy all around her, I personally felt like sometimes its the way you are made to feel by doctors matters the most while going for a medical procedure. Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu suggested me to undergo a pelvis scan test which I got it done as per her suggestion at Dr. Madhavi Scan Center. I had several follow up sessions with her and I always made sure that I ask her the questions and clear the thoughts in my mind and Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu was very polite in answering them all. I was diagnosed with a 5 cm fibroid (which I already knew) after the pelvis scan report was out and I wanted to get that removed by Laproscopic surgery. Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu explained me the risks related to the surgery very clearly and assured me not to be too scared about it and prepared me to be ready mentally. She was not hesitant about sharing any relevant information and at the same time never looked to hurry the proceedings. She advised me to get the medical tests done wich were relevant going for the laproscopic surgery. She also prepped me with the required things to be done and carried leading to the surgery. Finally I had my laproscopic surgery done by Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu and her team as planned on 20th Feb 2021 in Apollo Hospitals, Jubilee Hills and the entire experience was very good and smooth. I was able to stand up, walk, get discharged and go home the very next day i.e. 21st Feb 2021. I met the doctor again after a week post the surgery as advised and felt satisfied with the treatment received. 

The best thing I liked about Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu is her humblessness and down to earth attitude. She connects with her pateints in a very friendly nature and not like typical old school doctors (no offence here) and she doesn't get offended to answer our layman/silly questions and has good sense of humour in her answers. Indeed, I feel good and take pride that we have a doctor like Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu in our society and country and we need more doctors as such. I would definitely reccommend Dr. Vimee Bindra Basu to all the ladies who have or undergoing women's related health issues. GOD bless her with best of  health, peace  and life full of bliss.

I was having severe pelvic pain left side since 3 months during menstrual period and the pain lasts till 10 th day.I went to many gynaecologist they did USG mny times even MRI but they couldn't diagnose my disease after that I searched for the best gynaecologist in Hyderabad and I got to know about Dr vimee bindra,I saw many reviews of people about the doctor and then I decided to meet her , I went to Hyderabad and met her on 2 nd Feb in her cabin,she studied my report she asked for only one TVS USG and asked us to come in the evening with the report,the report showed ACUM a rare uterine disease,she told us that she will do my surgery the very next day on 3rd Feb we reached the hospital  at 9 am my routine test have been done ,e completed the admission procedure and they took me for ot at around 2 pm ,my surgery got done  ,I opened my eyes in the recovery recovery room,only that day I was having pain due to surgery,the next day Dr vimee came to visit me and she herself removed the drain and did my dressing.she made me comfortable and cleared all my doubts ,I got discharged on the same day thanks to Dr vimee and her whole team for giving me a new painfree life ,I'm very grateful to you and I'm very glad that my surgery has been done by you ,*** *** *** ******* ****** * **** **** **** **** thanku mam I will be forever grateful to you and I will always recommend you to everyone like me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Laparoscopic myomectomy surgery done by Dr vimee on 20th January 21.
DR Vimee Bindra is the best gynecologist I have ever come  across. I feel truly blessed to have found her,when I needed her help the most.Mine was a complicated case  of  multiple uterine fribriods and polyp which my family gynecologist had ignored at early stages.Doctor Vimee in my 1st consultation heard my issues with patience  and compassion and explained my diagnosis. Doctor removed the polyp which was troubling me for months,and other doctors had ignored it ,although it was an out patient procedure and I dint even feel pain like a prick. It's when I rested all my worries and knew that i was in safest  hands.
After further investigations Dr vimee explained that I will have to undergo a laparoscopic myomectomy.she clearly also mentioned i might have a chance of open surgery because of the huge fibroid size but always assured me that she will try her best to avoid it.
On 20th Jan 2021 I underwent my surgery which was estimated to last  5 - 6 hours but was successfully completed within 3.5 hours under general anesthesia. I could feel a difference when I woke up in recovery room. Its been 5 days  since my surgery and I am healing better by the day .
A BIG SALUTE  AND THANK YOU TO DOCTOR VIMEE BINDRA FOR EVERYTHING !!! ITS TRULY INSPIRING TO HAVE MET AN EXCEPTIONAL DOCTOR, A WOMEN OF SUSTANCE ,IN OUR  MIDST.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Am very thankful and grateful to Dr Vimee Bindra. She is understanding, kind and perfect in diagnosing the ailment. I have been suffering with severe abdominal pain and bleeding for the past 2 -3 years and am diagnosed with Diffuse Adenomayosis. Every month it had been a torture when am on my periods.  Doctor suggested me with conservative surgery laproscopic Adenomayomectomy and I had my surgery the very next day. Seems like it is a  surgery not every doctor can do or does. 

Am happily discharged in a day. The response and care taken by Hospital and staff is outstanding. Hopefully I will be recovering soon, become pain free  and have kids.

Anyone who is suffering with a similar problem and want to preserve their Uterus can be rest assured if you get treated by Dr. VIMEE BINDRA.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to Dr. Vimee Bindra for treatment for endometriosis. I had previously visited lot of doctors regarding my health and also had done a laproscopy surgery, but all those couldn't cure me fully. First of all I was deeply touched by Dr. Vimee' s calm attitude and friendly demeanor. She discussed with us all the treatment options. I am from out of state and we came to Apollo just to get treated by her. She understood our time constraints. We also further discussed with her online and decided to go for robotic laproscopy. The surgery went fine and I was released within 2 days. I am overall okay now. She is the best doctor I had seen who can properly relate with her patients and make them feel at ease. All the hospital staffs and Dr. Archana mam were very friendly, helpful and understood both Hindi and English. I trusted her with my health and that's why we opted for robotic laproscopy. I would recommend her for endometriosis treatment and robotic surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The admission  staff are not good they are charged more and not giving rooms even though rooms are free.and fully popoulated hospital  and not responding e  duty doctors are absolutely  my surgery doctor view Bindra is the one who is excellent in the whole process of my surgery  nurses does not English they cannot communicate with patients. Vani nurse is best among all sisters. OT staff are excellent. Covid test sample person is 
not  good again my test was inconclusive after taken sample from 2 nostrils without knowing painful test . Nobody is taking care why lots of people coming to hospital in this covid situation. Jubilee hills branch is like tirupati temple. Only I went there as Vince Bindra operate in that hospital only *** ** *** **** ****** ** **************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello all,
I had endometriosis.,with cyst of size 10cm*10cm on right overy.Before
Consulting here, I met 4 other Gynecs in hyd,Who scared me about my tedious operation of cyst removal... Then I met VIMEE BINDRA madam. The way madam spoke to me is very clear and in a friendly manner. The best part is she answers all your doubts without hesitating. She is available during emergency and answers your phone calls. She gives replies to your messages. Coming to my operation part,She has done it very neatly with no pain and minimal incision. If u are Pregnant or you are having  any Gynecology Problems please meet her. She is very good at her job. I spent much time in search for a good doctor. This is my feedback for u so that u save your time. This is my Genuine feedback to help women out there. Thank you once Again VIMEE BINDRA madam for giving me **** treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: In fifth month of my pregnancy, we chose to consult Dr. Vimee Bindra when we were running short of options. After lot of research and thought process, we were really relieved after our first consultation and we were very confident that "We are In Safe Hands". The best thing in doctor is her style of treating patients is very well organized. She spends quality time with patients, gives space to patient incl.patient's attender(s), understand root cause of the problem through proper diagnosis and recommends medication starting from low intensity. We are really lucky to have a wonderful doctor and till birth of our baby, we completely trusted her advice without a second thought. Lastly, Doctor has very good sense of humor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: she was rude to me. She wanted to perform a pap smear test but it was too much painful so I couldn't cooperate. Didn't explain properly about the surgery. too busy to even speak an extra word. she became impatient when I asked questions about surgery and side effects. Won't recommend her.  hospital is over crowded. I felt even more sick seeing the crowd honestly. the Bed next to the doctor (where she internally examines a patient) was dirty and unhygienic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Advance booking slot didn't work at hospital. We still needs to register and wait for more than an hour to wait. People who were there first have completed their appointment and then our nunber came. 
So I don't see practo appointment really worked there. It first come first appointment kind of practice.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Hi,
I had a Histerectomy in Netherlands. After that i had water leakage from Vagina. this was very annoying and i had to use sanitary pads day and night.
The doctor in Netherlands could not diagnose the problem. Three months after surgery , i met Dr Vimee Bindra in Apollo hospitals Jubilee hills Hyderabad. In my first visit, she diagnosed that urine ws leaking from the vagina and I had a Vesico Vaginal Fistula.This was a complication from  the Histerectomy. She sent me for ultrasound abdomen and also did Vaginoscopy to confirm the same. With the help of a Urologist she performed a Robotic Surgery on me and repaired the fistula.
I am very fortunate to have met her. I am very greatful to her.
She acted very quickly and solved my problem. She is a very caring person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Me and my wife went to consult about baby planning. But doctor was too much in hurry. She **** wrote multiple tests which cost you around 20k and also did not explained ******** what and how the test will be. At least she should listen to the patient carefully and give some time so that patient also get time to open up with doctor. Before completing our answer she fires another question. 
We totally unsatisfied with the 1st consultancy. She **** sits here for 1 hour and not even giving 10 min to one patient* *** **** *** ** ****** *** *****

review: Dr. Vimee Bindra is an expert in endometriosis and adenomyosis. She is one of the few excision surgeons in the world for endometriosis, which is the correct treatment for endometriosis. I highly recommend her.
